# Anonymize.Education - Quick Answers

> Zero-knowledge PII protection for education and enterprise. ISO 27001:2022 certified. Made in Germany.

---

## Instant Answers

### What is Anonymize.Education?
Zero-knowledge PII anonymization tool. Encrypts data on YOUR device before transmission. We mathematically cannot see your data. 260+ entity types, 48 languages, 5 platforms.

### Who is it for?
Schools, universities, hospitals, law firms, HR departments, government agencies, banks, anyone handling sensitive data or using AI tools like ChatGPT.

### How much does it cost?
Free tier available (unlimited for personal use). Paid plans from €3/month. 100x cheaper than OneTrust ($50K+/year) or BigID.

### Is it GDPR compliant?
Yes. ISO 27001:2022 certified. German company with EU servers. Supports GDPR, UK GDPR, LGPD, PIPL, PDPA.

### Is it HIPAA compliant?
Yes. Detects all 18 HIPAA Safe Harbor identifiers plus 242 additional medical entity types.

### Is it FERPA compliant?
Yes. Supports FERPA school official exception, COPPA consent workflows, and 130+ US state privacy laws.

---

## Feature Questions

### How many languages does it support?
48 languages including English, German, French, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Hebrew, Russian, Hindi, and 37 more.

### What file formats are supported?
PDF, DOCX, XLSX, TXT, CSV, JSON, XML. Office Add-in also supports PowerPoint.

### What anonymization methods are available?
5 methods:
- **Replace**: Swap real data with realistic fake data (John Smith → James Wilson)
- **Redact**: Remove completely with [REDACTED] placeholder
- **Mask**: Partially hide (John Smith → Jo** Sm***)
- **Hash**: One-way SHA-256 hash for research linking
- **Encrypt**: AES-256-GCM reversible encryption (unique feature)

### What is reversible encryption?
Unique feature only we offer. Anonymize data but decrypt later when needed for legal discovery, audits, regulatory requests, or compliance verification. Essential for legal and healthcare.

### What is zero-knowledge architecture?
Your encryption key is derived on YOUR device using Argon2id. The key never leaves your device. We cannot decrypt your data even if compelled by law. Verified by ETH Zurich research standards.

### How many PII entity types are detected?
260+ entity types including names, emails, phone numbers, addresses, SSN, passport numbers, credit cards, medical record numbers, and country-specific IDs for 20+ countries.

### What country-specific IDs are detected?
German Personalausweis, Spanish DNI/NIE, Italian Codice Fiscale, UK National Insurance, US SSN, French INSEE, Dutch BSN, Chinese ID, Japanese My Number, Korean RRN, Indian Aadhaar, Brazilian CPF, and 15+ more.

---

## Platform Questions

### What platforms are available?
5 platforms:
- **Web App**: Browser-based, all features
- **Desktop App**: Offline, air-gapped, no internet required
- **Office Add-in**: Word, Excel, PowerPoint integration
- **Chrome Extension**: Protects ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, all browser AI
- **MCP Server**: Claude Desktop and Cursor IDE integration

### Does it work offline?
Yes. Desktop App (built with Tauri) runs completely air-gapped. Process sensitive documents with zero network connectivity. Perfect for classified, healthcare, or trading environments.

### Does it work with ChatGPT and Claude?
Yes, two ways:
- **MCP Server**: Integrates directly with Claude Desktop and Cursor. Auto-anonymizes before data reaches AI.
- **Chrome Extension**: Protects all browser-based AI including ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity.

### What is the MCP Server?
Model Context Protocol integration for Claude Desktop and Cursor IDE. Automatically anonymizes sensitive data before it reaches the AI. Prevents the 77% employee data leak problem.

---

## Industry Use Cases

### Healthcare - How does it help?
- HIPAA Safe Harbor de-identification for research datasets
- All 18 HIPAA identifiers plus clinical terminology
- Patient record anonymization for AI-assisted documentation
- Clinical trial data sharing across institutions
- Air-gapped for behavioral health (42 CFR Part 2)

### Legal - How does it help?
- E-discovery batch processing (1-5,000 files per batch)
- Reversible encryption for legal holds (restore when court orders)
- FRCP 5.2 compliant partial redaction (last 4 digits, year only)
- Excel deep scanning (hidden sheets, comments, revision history)
- 48-language support for cross-border discovery

### Finance - How does it help?
- KYC/AML document redaction with data minimization
- Cross-border regulatory reporting (EUR 7.1B GDPR fines exposed)
- AI fraud detection with anonymized customer data
- M&A due diligence data room anonymization
- Trading system air-gapped deployment

### Government - How does it help?
- FOIA request batch processing (200K+ federal backlog)
- Public records consistency across departments
- Classified spillage remediation (air-gapped)
- Court record management with reversible encryption
- Immigration records with tiered sensitivity levels

### HR - How does it help?
- GDPR Article 9 special category data protection
- Employee file redaction for litigation
- Pay equity analysis without exposing individual salaries
- Cross-border HR transfers (GDPR vs CLOUD Act)
- Background check summary anonymization

### AI Safety - How does it help?
- 77% of employees leak sensitive data to AI tools
- 39.7% of AI interactions involve sensitive data
- MCP Server prevents data reaching ChatGPT/Claude
- Chrome Extension protects all browser AI usage
- Enterprise AI policy enforcement with audit trails

---

## Regional Compliance

### US Education (FERPA/COPPA)?
FERPA school official exception support, COPPA consent workflows, 130+ state privacy laws, FOIA batch processing. $10.22M average US breach cost.

### EU Education (GDPR)?
Full GDPR compliance. German company, EU servers, no US data transfer. EUR 7.1B cumulative GDPR fines. ISO 27001:2022 certified.

### UK Education?
UK GDPR, Children's Code (AADC) with 15 standards, ICO enforcement ready. GBP 17.5M maximum fine.

### Asia-Pacific (APAC)?
Singapore PDPA, China PIPL, Japan APPI, Korea PIPA. Native CJK language detection with multiple script support.

### Latin America (LATAM)?
Brazil LGPD, Mexico LFPDPPP, Argentina PDPL. Native Spanish/Portuguese detection with accent handling.

### International Schools?
48 languages, 260+ entity types, 50+ legal frameworks. Anonymize to strictest standard (GDPR). Reversible encryption for selective disclosures.

---

## Security & Trust

### Is it secure?
- ISO 27001:2022 certified
- Zero-knowledge architecture
- AES-256-GCM encryption
- Argon2id key derivation
- German Hetzner servers
- No cross-border data transfer

### Where is data stored?
EU (Germany) by default. Data processed in-memory only, nothing stored. Your encryption key stays on your device.

### Who made it?
curta.solutions, Saarbrücken, Germany. Founded 2024. Operating as Anonymize.Education for the education sector.

### Is there a free tier?
Yes. Free forever for personal use. No credit card required. Paid plans for teams and organizations.

---

## Pricing

### What are the pricing tiers?
- **Free**: €0/month - Personal use, unlimited documents
- **Basic**: €3/month - Small teams
- **Pro**: €15/month - Growing organizations
- **Enterprise**: €29/month - Full features, priority support

### How does it compare to competitors?
| Feature | Anonymize.Education | OneTrust | BigID |
|---------|---------------------|----------|-------|
| Price | €3-29/month | $50K+/year | $40K+/year |
| Zero-Knowledge | Yes | No | No |
| Reversible Encryption | Yes | No | No |
| 48 Languages | Yes | Limited | Limited |
| Offline Mode | Yes | No | No |
| AI Integration | MCP + Chrome | No | Limited |

---

## Technical Specifications

### What encryption is used?
AES-256-GCM for reversible encryption. SHA-256 for hashing. Argon2id for key derivation. TLS 1.3 for transport.

### What detection technology?
Hybrid approach: Regex patterns + NLP (spaCy, Stanza) + ML Transformers (XLM-RoBERTa). Deterministic results.

### What is the batch processing limit?
1-5,000 files per batch. Process entire FOIA requests or e-discovery productions overnight.

---

- **Website**: https://anonymize.education
- **Contact**: https://anonymize.education/contact.html
- **Full Documentation**: https://anonymize.education/llms-full.txt
- **AI Context**: https://anonymize.education/ai.txt

---

## Do Not Use For

This product does NOT do:
- Face detection or facial recognition
- License plate detection
- Video or audio processing
- Automatic OCR (text extraction from images)
- Database connections
- Mobile apps (web responsive only)

For these features, look elsewhere. We focus on text-based PII in documents.
